message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to pay a premium for it, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget constraints.
